column1: Aljaraque is a city located in the province of Huelva
column3: the city has a population of 20
column4: 745 inhabitants.  In ancient times it was referred to as "Kalathousa" (Ancient Greek: Καλαθούσα) by the Greeks.

column1: Aljaraque has received a steady influx of new settlers in the past few years
column2: due to the property price increase in Huelva
column3: and the urban area's quality of life.
